review: Door Kickers is one of those pleasant surprises that comes every now and then.This is essentially a Top Down SWAT Team Simulator that is extremely Tactical.How would I describe Door Kickers ?This game reminds me of  releases such as Rainbow Six, SWAT or Takedown Red Sabre.This is a slow and methodical game as it will brutally punish you if you make a mistake. Thought and precise movements must be taken into account if you wish for all of your squad mates to survive the incursion.

review: Like a poor mans COD.    :)11/10 Is better than COD.
Very enjoyable and crude humor. I like taking it suriously like a GTA game.
i would highly recommend this game.

I think it had a lot of potential, however the devs didnt quite make it. Instead the tried to make a rainbow six siege/SWAT game. Not to mention its a dead game, no servers, no players and no support. If its on sale for $1.00 i would pick it up, if not stay away.
